name: 劉祐綸
objective: This module examines recent developments in marketing thinking and market strategy development. It focuses on the dynamic aspects of market strategy development, and the creation of customer value. A further focus throughout the module will be the discussion of contemporary marketing issues to explore and to understand the complexity of marketing activities.
schedule:
Week 01: Introduction to International marketing strategy 
Week 02: Analyse and understand the marketing environment 
Week 03: Culture in international marketing 
Week 04: Global trade and integration 
Week 05: Markets and segmentation in an international context and international positioning
Week 06: Market research in the international environment
Week 07: Principles of consumer characters and international product standardization and adaption
Week 08: Innovation marketing strategies
Week 09: Service marketing models
Week 10: Mid-term exam week (No class)
Week 11: Pricing and distribution 
Week 12: IMC and international product and brand marketing
Week 13: International marketing channel management and core value delivery 
Week 14: International sales promotions and public relations
Week 15: International marketing planning, organising, and control
Week 16: Ethics issues in international marketing
Week 17: Revision
Week 18: Final exam week (No class)
materials: International Marketing (2e) - Baack et al., SAGE Publishing, 2019
